text.name: Prepare To Collect
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">2 [Vibration] Count
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Coin Power +1

text.name: Prepare To Collect
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">3 [Vibration] Count
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Coin Power +1

text.name: T Corp. Microcavity Module
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion] once; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: T Corp. Microcavity Module
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">3 [Vibration] Count
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Coin Power +1
coinDescs: <style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ [Vibration], consume 4 [Vibration] on target to apply +2 [Vibration] Count to both the target and self

<style="highlight">[OnSucceedAttack] If the target isn't in [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration] states, consume 3 [Vibration] Count on self to trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationChainPersonality]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion] once; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

text.name: T Corp. Microcavity Module
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">4 [Vibration] Count
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ [Vibration], consume 4 [Vibration] on target to apply +2 [Vibration] Count to both the target and self<style="highlight">
<style="highlight"> If target is in either [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration] states, this Coin deals +60% damage

[OnSucceedAttack] If the target isn't in [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration] states, consume 3 [Vibration] Count on self to trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationChainPersonality]<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion] once; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

text.name: T-3 Collector Mace Max Activation
text.desc:
If target has [TimeSuspend], deal +30% damage
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Coin Power +1
[EndSkill] Lose [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] on self
[EndSkill] Gain [OutisNoHat] (once per Encounter)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 3 [Vibration] on target
- Gain +([Vibration] consumed x 2) [Vibration] Count
- Inflict ([Vibration] consumed - 1) [Binding] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

[OnStartCoin] Consume all [Vibration] Count on self
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Vibration] Count consumed (max 5)
- Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Vibration] Count consumed (max 50%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: T-3 Collector Mace Max Activation
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If target is in either [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration] states, deal +30% damage
If target has [TimeSuspend], deal +30% damage
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Vibration] on target (max 2)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has [Binding] Clash Power +1
[EndSkill] Lose [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] on self
[EndSkill] Gain [OutisNoHat] (once per Encounter)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 3 [Vibration] on target<style="highlight">
- Gain +([Vibration] consumed x 2) [Vibration] Count<style="highlight">
- Inflict ([Vibration] consumed - 1) [Binding] next turn<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [Vibration] Count, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

[OnStartCoin] Consume all [Vibration] Count on self<style="highlight">
- Coin Power +1 for every <style="highlight">4 [Vibration] Count consumed (max 5)
- Deal +<style="highlight">2% damage for every 1 [Vibration] Count consumed (max 100%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

1111321.name: Expeditious Execution of Official Duties
1111321.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed deals +10% damage when attacking a Staggered target.

1111301.name: Golden Time - Microcavity
1111301.desc:
Turn End: If this unit's HP is between 10% ~ 20%, instantly heal 80% of this unit's max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

If this unit has [TimeRentalTwoPersonality], its Skills gain Final Power +1
